      • allFields

        @Nonnull
protected final Set<EntityMapper.Field> allFields
        The set allFields will grow to contain all fields, based on mappers, which are removed one by one by the 'field' method. When record checking is done, the set is checked for non-checked fields. This field is directly referenced in threads, so must be thread safe.

      • nrRecordsInCollection

      • createUniquenessChecker

        @Nonnull
protected <T> CheckDBBase.UniquenessChecker<T> createUniquenessChecker(boolean logAsErrors,
                                                                                @Nonnull
                                                                                EntityMapper.Field<?>... fieldPath)
        Creates a new CheckDBBase.UniquenessChecker for this collection. The returned UniquenessChecker must only be used for data contained within this collection, otherwise uniqueness violations will be reported on the wrong collection. Values to check for uniqueness can then be added to it using add(Uid, Object) or add(Uid, Collection). The actual check will be performed once all other checks in this CollectionChecker have been finished, to ensure that all values to check for uniqueness have been added to the UniquenessChecker.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the values to check for uniqueness
        Parameters:
        logAsErrors - True if violations are logged as errors, false if logged as warnings.
        fieldPath - The field path within the collection that needs to be unique over all the elements of the collection.
        Returns:
        Returns a new UniquenessChecker.
